attributes.action: Bring back rationing in times of national crisis
attributes.additional_details: The most valuable in our society are at much greater risk of starvation and suffering due to peoples idiocy! It's time for the Government to step in and bring back a rationing system to ensure all get a fair share in times of need.
attributes.background: The sheer greed of today is outstanding. Mums can't get nappies, baby formula, families are struggling to find every day basics as people are panic buying on a scale never seen. Every day during this covid19 pandemic is bringing black friday frenzied shoppers. It's time for the government to act!
